Scholar.name: Wandering Mage
Scholar.description: A young mage exploring the lands, eager to learn new spells.

Scholar.name: Mushroom Mage
Scholar.description: A curious scholar who harnesses the power of fungi for magic.

Scholar.name: Fire Mage
Scholar.description: A mage who wields fire with precision, controlling flames effortlessly.

Scholar.name: Water Magician
Scholar.description: A calm mage who manipulates water to protect and attack.

Scholar.name: Lightning Mage
Scholar.description: An experienced mage, striking enemies with powerful lightning.

Scholar.name: Silent Witch
Scholar.description: A legendary mage whose silent presence hides immense power.

Conqueror.name: Mercenary
Conqueror.description: A fresh fighter, skilled in basic combat and strategy.

Conqueror.name: Warrior
Conqueror.description: A dedicated student learning the ways of battle and honor.

Conqueror.name: Assassin
Conqueror.description: A deadly fighter who strikes from the shadows with precision.

Conqueror.name: Priest
Conqueror.description: A calm and wise protector who heals and shields allies.

Conqueror.name: Paladin
Conqueror.description: A battle-hardened warrior, righteous and experienced in many fights.

Conqueror.name: Holy Knight
Conqueror.description: A legendary knight whose valor inspires all on the battlefield.

Forest Monster.name: Goblin
Forest Monster.description: A mischievous creature, quick but fragile in combat.

Forest Monster.name: Slime
Forest Monster.description: A slow, gelatinous creature that absorbs attacks with ease.

Forest Monster.name: Orc
Forest Monster.description: A strong forest brute with unmatched strength in battles.

Forest Monster.name: Troll
Forest Monster.description: A tough monster, patient but deadly when provoked.

Forest Monster.name: Shaman
Forest Monster.description: A mystical creature channeling forest magic to attack and defend.

Forest Monster.name: Goblin King
Forest Monster.description: The cunning ruler of goblins, feared and respected by all.

Demon.name: Skeleton
Demon.description: A restless skeleton, weak but relentless in numbers.

Demon.name: Hell Spider
Demon.description: A cunning spider that traps prey in dark.

Demon.name: Hell Bee
Demon.description: A venomous demon insect that attacks in swift swarms.

Demon.name: Hell Worm
Demon.description: A massive underground worm, burrowing and ambushing enemies.

Demon.name: Vampire
Demon.description: A night stalker who drains life to strengthen its own powers.

Demon.name: Hell Knight
Demon.description: A legendary demon warrior, armored and feared across realms.

Forest Guard.name: Boar
Forest Guard.description: A wild forest boar, charging at enemies with raw strength.

Forest Guard.name: Flower
Forest Guard.description: A gentle plant creature, using nature to shield and heal allies.

Forest Guard.name: Elf Guard
Forest Guard.description: A skilled forest warrior, agile and precise in battle.

Forest Guard.name: Golem
Forest Guard.description: A sturdy guardian of the woods, slow but nearly unstoppable.

Forest Guard.name: Dwarf Warrior
Forest Guard.description: A battle-hardened dwarf, defending the forest with axe and shield.

Forest Guard.name: Ancient Golem
Forest Guard.description: A legendary guardian, imbued with ancient magic and immense strength.
